Ayat Kursi verse categorized as the most exalted as it includes the name of Allah the most exalted, namely Al Hayyu and Al Qayyum. But scholars disagree Which Gods greatest name. 2. Exceeded sublimity of Heaven and Earth  Prophet sallallaahu alaihi wa sallam said, It is not God created the heavens and the earth exceeds the regal Ayat Kursi (as in the verse has been covering Names and Attributes of Allah)  Sufyan ats-Thawri said, For a chair paragraph (a) kalamullah (word of God), while kalamullah was greater than in the form of Gods creation of heaven and earth (HR.
